data.oai_dc:dc: Data file required to run model 2 at the site level. Data included in the file are the site ID, average annual temperature in oC (MAT), mean annual precipitation in mm yr-1 (MAP), solar insolation in KWh m-2 day-1 (SOLAR.INS), atmospheric nitrogen deposition in kg ha-1 yr-1(N.DEPOSITION), a grazing index and the percent of biomass that is grass (PERCENT.GRASS.BIOMASS).
